response.original_title: The Devilish Desire Of Dario Dragani
response.overview: In this loose, modern re-telling of THE CABINET OF DR. CALIGARI, Dave Ferrier plays Dario Dragani, a douche bag office supervisor and skilled mesmerist. Craving power, wealth and women, he uses his powers to command his business protégé Cecil to murder those who stand in his way to financial gain (and sweet loving' with Jane, the office hottie).
response.title: The Devilish Desire Of Dario Dragani
